attributes.action: Call for the immediate reinstatement of Jonathan Ross and Russell Brand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Of two million listeners to Russell Brand's radio programme, only two people complained.
Now there have been 18000 complaints (and rising) largely as a result of media campaigns by the likes of the Daily Mail, Sun and others with a vested interest or ulterior motive.
Those people who enjoy this type of comedy should not be dictated to by the likes of these newspapers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
